item.description: Assignment 1 # Question 1 # Problem Description # Given an integer n as input, print its binary representation starting with the most significant bit, i.e. don’t print the 0’s before the first 1. Link to problem on OJ Input constraints # \( 0 \le n \le 2^{30} \) Input format # The only line of input contains a single integer n Output Format # Output a continous stream of bits of n starting from the most significant bit.

item.description: Assignment 2 # Question 1 - “Doubling Investments” # Problem Description # Mitansh is worldâ€™s best investor. Whatever the amount he has today, it doubles on the next day. Initially he starts, with amount zero. Each day in the morning, he can choose to invest \(\$x\) more in addition to his previous amount \(\$y\) . And on next day, his total amount becomes \(\$2(x+y)\) . However, he wants to get exactly \(\$z\) on some day.
